treatment-md.title: Aristelix persica Peris-Felipo, Ameri, Talebi & Belokobylskij, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Review of the genus Aristelix Nixon, 1943 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), with description of a new species from Iran and clarification of the status of Antrusachrysogastra (Tobias, 1986)
